00022 #include "win32_timer.hpp"
00023 
00024 namespace uStreamLib {
00025         Impl_Timer::Impl_Timer(void)
00026                 : _u_telapsed(0)
00027         {
00028                 QueryPerformanceFrequency(&_pfreq);
00029         }
00030 
00031         Impl_Timer::~Impl_Timer(void)
00032         {
00033                 // nothing to do
00034         }
00035 
00036         void Impl_Timer::reset(void)
00037         {
00038                 _u_telapsed = 0;
00039         }
00040 
00041         void Impl_Timer::start(void)
00042         {
00043                 QueryPerformanceCounter(&_tstart);
00044         }
00045 
00046         uint32 Impl_Timer::getElapsed(void)
00047         {
00048                 return _u_telapsed;
00049         }
00050 
00051         void Impl_Timer::stop(TimeDesc* td)
00052         {
00053                 DWORD delta = 0, msec = 0;
00054                 double seconds = 0.0;
00055                 div_t val;
00056 
00057                 memset(td, 0, sizeof(TimeDesc));
00058 
00059                 QueryPerformanceCounter(&_tstop);
00060 
00061                 delta = _tstop.LowPart - _tstart.LowPart;
00062                 seconds = (double) ((double) delta / (double) _pfreq.LowPart);
00063                 msec = (DWORD) ((double) seconds * 1.0e3);
00064                 _u_telapsed = (uint32) (seconds * 1.0e6);
00065 
00066                 /*
00067                         printf("delta       = %ld\n", delta);
00068                         printf("seconds     = %f\n",  seconds);
00069                         printf("msec        = %ld\n", msec);
00070                         printf("_u_telapsed = %ld\n", _u_telapsed);
00071                  */
00072 
00073                 val = div(msec, 3600000);
00074                 td->hours = val.quot;
00075                 td->msec = val.rem;
00076 
00077                 val = div(td->msec, 60000);
00078                 td->min = val.quot;
00079                 td->msec = val.rem;
00080 
00081                 val = div(td->msec, 1000);
00082                 td->sec = val.quot;
00083                 td->msec = val.rem;
00084                 td->usec = 0;
00085 
00086                 /*
00087                         printf("hours       = %d\n", td->hours);
00088                         printf("minutes     = %d\n", td->min);
00089                         printf("seconds     = %d\n", td->sec);
00090                         printf("msec        = %d\n", td->msec);
00091                  */
00092         }
00093 }
